text: Muhammad ibn Ahmad ibn Gazi (; about 1437 â€“ 1513) was a mathematician from the Maghreb. He wrote poems about the work of other mathematicians, including Ibn al-Banna' al-Marrakushi. He used lattice multiplication in his math writing. ==Related pages== * List of scientists ==References== Category:Mathematicians Category:African scientists Category:1437 births Category:1513 deaths Category:Arab people Category:Moroccan scientists
title: Muhammad ibn Ahmad ibn Gazi
